features: Efficient Cleanup: The Carlisle FoodService Products Duo-Pan Upright Dust Pan features a pivoting design that allows the pan to pivot upward, facilitating the clean and spill-free transport of collected dust and debris
Hands-Free Operation: Its serrated yoke, with a rotating, notched design, effectively removes dust and debris without requiring the use of gloves or bare hands
Precise Cleaning: The low-profile edge of the dustpan hugs the floor, ensuring a deeper and closer clean, picking up even the tiniest particles for a thorough cleaning process
Secure Disposal: The locking pan head feature allows the pan to lock into place, preventing any accidental spills or mess during disposal, making cleanup quick and hassle-free

Versatile Application: Designed for use in various settings, including homes, restaurants, kitchens, lobbies, and offices, this 30-inch black plastic dust pan offers a practical and durable solution for all your cleaning needs
body.description: Say goodbye to the days of messy dustpan usage and welcome a revolution in cleaning with our Duo-Pan Upright Dust Pan. Whether you're at home, in a restaurant, kitchen, lobby, or office, this 30-inch black plastic wonder is your solution for efficient, hands-free, and precise cleaning. The Duo-Pan's ingenious pivoting design lets you say farewell to spill-prone cleanups. It effortlessly pivots upward, allowing you to transport collected dust and debris without any mess. No more frustrating dust and dirt escaping during disposal! Cleaning doesn't have to be a hands-on task anymore. Thanks to the serrated yoke with a rotating, notched design, this dust pan effectively removes dust and debris without the need for gloves or bare hands. Clean up without getting your hands dirty! Our Duo-Pan features a low-profile edge that hugs the floor, ensuring a deeper and closer clean. It doesn't let even the tiniest particles escape, delivering a thorough cleaning experience that leaves your space spotless. The locking pan head feature takes the worry out of cleanup. Once the debris is collected, the pan securely locks in place, preventing accidental spills during disposal. Quick and hassle-free – just the way you want it! Designed for use in a variety of settings, our Duo-Pan Upright Dust Pan is a versatile cleaning solution. Whether you're tidying up at home, a bustling restaurant, a busy kitchen, a pristine lobby, or a bustling office, it's up for the challenge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, easy to put together and use, works brilliantly!
reviews.reviewText: Handles come in two pieces which fit together perfectly fine for me once I realized what went where. This rests perfectly against the floor and it's very easy to sweep dirt and debris in with little to no dirt line left behind. Not sure why so many other reviewers are having issues with this unless they just received defective parts, or maybe there's a bit of a learning curve with this perhaps?I used these back when I was young'n working at a movie theatre and it's just the same as it was back then. This dustpan is very sturdily built and nice and heavy so it doesn't pick up easy to let dirt under it when sweeping stuff into the bin and you don't have to put extra pressure to hold it down like you do regular dustpans. It's a great feature, and the bin has a lip on it that makes it easy to tilt into the garbage can without having to touch the bottom that was just on the floor. Bonus! If you have bad lower back or balance issues and can't bend over to far to use a regular dustpan, this one is fantastic.The nice thing is that the tab does catch and helps keep the handle straight so it doesn't fall or move or get in the way while sweeping dirt in. To unlatch it just step on the dustbin to keep it from moving, and bend the stick out again and it just snaps right back out; it's quite simple. Also, the broom itself has two slots where you can insert the handle; one straight up and one at an angle to accommodate your preference.Contrary to some of the other reviews, you really can store the broom right in the bin - you just move the stick aside to get the hook part out of the way and pop it in. There's even a nice clip that holds the handles together, and they stand up nice and straight because the bottom of the bin is nice and flat. And if you're careful putting the broom in and don't get all the bristles caught to where they bend back and aren't sweeping sideways, it won't bow out on you either. How it behaves honestly just depends on how you treat it, - it's just like any other broom of this type.The only con is that the bristles want to hang on to any kind of fuzz like mad, and while it has some slots on the bin holder to help, I don't find that it works very well for me. But, since this is pretty much the same for all brooms of this type and a few plastic rungs aren't really a fair match for pet fur, it's not worth knocking off a star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a large, long handled, heavy duty dustpan. It was much too large for my home kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy but hard to close. Impossible to find matching broom
reviews.reviewText: I very much love the dustpan. Sturdy. You get the dirt into the pan without any leftovers on the floor. The only 2 things I don't like too much are. First: When I want to fold it back to close it is very hard to snap it into the folding position. Two: Ok I made the wrong decision and bought it without the broom because I already had one. But my cleaning lady decided to ruin it quickly. So I need a broom replacement. It is more or less impossible to find a replacement for this dustpan. Why is this? They sell the dustpan separately. Why not the brooms? Since no other company seems to sell replacement brooms. I figured at least this company would. Sometimes it is hard to understand the logic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a broom and dustpan
reviews.reviewText: Good for small spaces, gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality dust pan
reviews.reviewText: I really like this dust pan! It helps so much when I’m cleaning and not having to bend over and hold a small mobile dust pan, while trying to sweep the dirt does not go in the pan until after several attempts. This dust pan fits flush with the floor and only takes one or two sweeps to the job done. Makes cleaning. Mush easier in my back and saves time! I wish I would have purchased sooner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Es bueno aunque se atora y cuesta un poco para sacarlo.
This was a great buy. Im a hair dresser and my back has been bugging me and this has definitely saved my back.

¡Lo amé! Sí está muy chaparrita la escoba (yo mido menos de 1.60m), pero la usé tras una remodelación, y levanta hasta el yeso en polvo (claro que una parte se esparce en el aire por lo fino que es). El recogedor tiene la rampa dura (lo cual promete durabilidad) pero como quiera no le pide nada a otros, pues sí permite recoger partículas pequeñas (aunque para el polvo más fino, a penas ponerle cinta adhesiva). Y está padre que sea cerrado, para que no se vuelve el polvo al trasladarlo.¡10/10!
Very sturdy. The broom is excellent. And the dustpan really catches the dirt 100%. No dirt sneaks under the dustpan. Would recommend to a friend. And obviously this is very back-friendly.

reviews.reviewTitle: 丈夫さはいいが重すぎる
reviews.reviewText: 丈夫さは日本の製品にないものですが、重すぎて力の弱い人には扱いづらいところがあります。また、ブラシを収納するたびにワイヤが折れ曲がってしまうため、丁寧に収納しなければなりません。店舗など玄関先を素早く掃除する用途が多いのかとも思いますが、手軽さと堅牢度を両立するような製品づくりが求められると思います。
